name: Gunslinger
details: You like a weapon that makes an impression almost as much as you like making an impression.

pf2t.name: Gunslinger
pf2t.body: You like a weapon that makes an impression almost as much as you like making an impression.

name: Gunslinger Dedication
details: You become trained in simple and martial crossbows and simple and martial firearms. You become trained in gunslinger class DC.

Choose a gunslinger way. You become trained in your way's associated skill; if you were already trained in this skill, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of way.
special: You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the gunslinger archetype.

name: Basic Shooting
details: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level gunslinger feat of your choice.

pf2t.name: Basic Shooting
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Gunslinger
**Prerequisites** Gunslinger Dedication

- - -

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level gunslinger feat of your choice.

#### Basic Shooting Leads To...
Advanced Shooting

name: Advanced Shooting
details: You gain one gunslinger feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your gunslinger level is equal to half your level.
special: You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another gunslinger feat.

pf2t.name: Advanced Shooting
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Gunslinger
**Prerequisites** Basic Shooting

- - -

You gain one gunslinger feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your gunslinger level is equal to half your level.

name: Slinger's Readiness
details: You've learned a gunslinger's tricks for staking out your territory in a fight. You gain the initial deed for the way you selected with Gunslinger's Dedication.

pf2t.name: Slinger's Readiness
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Gunslinger
**Prerequisites** Gunslinger Dedication

- - -

You've learned a gunslinger's tricks for staking out your territory in a fight. You gain the initial deed for the way you selected with Gunslinger's Dedication.

name: Practiced Reloads
details: You've mastered the reloading techniques and methods usually practiced by only the most dedicated firearm professionals. You gain the slinger's reload for the way you selected with Gunslinger's Dedication.

pf2t.name: Practiced Reloads
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Gunslinger
**Prerequisites** Gunslinger Dedication

- - -

You've mastered the reloading techniques and methods usually practiced by only the most dedicated firearm professionals. You gain the slinger's reload for the way you selected with Gunslinger's Dedication.

name: Eagle Eye
details: Your practice with crossbows and firearms has sharpened your attention to detail. You become a master in Perception.

pf2t.name: Eagle Eye
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Gunslinger
**Prerequisites** Gunslinger Dedication; expert in Perception

- - -

Your practice with crossbows and firearms has sharpened your attention to detail. You become a master in Perception.

name: Firearm Expert
prerequisites: expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
details: You've become an expert with your chosen weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple and martial crossbows and simple and martial firearms increase to expert.

pf2t.name: Firearm Expert
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Gunslinger
**Prerequisites** Gunslinger Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack

- - -

You've become an expert with your chosen weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple and martial crossbows and simple and martial firearms increase to expert.
